content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab entity at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) and a chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and a chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when refueling entities
- Make sure to have enough fuel in inventory before attempting to refuel entities
### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Make sure to have enough items in inventory before attempting to insert items into furnaces
### Errors when using pipes
- Make sure to connect pipes correctly to avoid fluid system errors
### Errors when using generators
- Make sure to connect generators to a fluid system to avoid "no input liquid" errors
### Errors when using boilers
- Make sure to fuel boilers to avoid "out of fuel" errors
